name: Omnia Vincit Amor (Mac OS)
description:
Kassandra is a 17 year old girl, unhappy to live with her cruel stepmother and stepsister. When she decided to run away, her life suddenly changed. Not only is she faced with her mysterious past, she even have to save her feauture. Not that easy for a girl, which did not even believed in monster, fairies and hidden worlds.

This is her story...

The story of this project is based on a fantasy novel I wrote a couple of years ago but never published it. It also is the first RPG maker game I've ever made. I hope you'll enjoy it.
